Summary: white spherical object observed around 9:40am in clear sky, no surrounding craft
divs: sighting detailswhile vacuuming car at a car wash in pleasanton, i looked up (why i don't know)to the sky and observed a white spherical object (aspirin size, maybe 1000 ft +\- (not good at aerial distance). the object was absolutely stationery for about 2 minutes in one position then moved laterally, somewhat slowly about 3 inches left if you held up a ruler to the sky (again, not good with distances). it stayed stationary again for about 1-2 minutes but i had to get going but when i completed my car vacuuming (about 5 mins later) the object was gone. the object was somewhat overhead, to the west.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Pleasanton
There were no other sightings in Pleasanton on or around September 12th 2011
